figure_2: Specific activities that students engaged in during and after the CURE. Boxes with a solid outline signify a required activity and boxes with a dashed outline signify an activity that students were invited to volunteer to participate in, but that was not required as part of the course or to be an author on the CURE manuscript. Shaded boxes indicate activities that occurred during the semester of the CURE and white boxes indicate activities that occurred after the CURE had ended.
